title: Auto SEO & Blog Posting
subtitle: Turning missed calls into qualified viewings without lifting a finger.
description: How a boutique agency used AI agents to qualify leads 24/7, turning missed calls into scheduled viewings automatically.

problemStatement.main: Neon Realty was bleeding opportunities. With agents spending 6 hours a day vetting tire-kickers and missing 40% of inbound calls after hours, their marketing ROI was plummeting despite high traffic.

points.title: LEAKY FUNNEL
points.description: 60% of leads went cold before an agent could reach them.

points.title: AGENT BURNOUT
points.description: Top performers were wasting time on low-quality leads.

points.title: MISSED AFTER-HOURS
points.description: Zero response capability for evening/weekend inquiries.

points.title: SCHEDULING NIGHTMARE
points.description: Endless back-and-forth emails to book simple viewings.

timeline.title: DISCOVERY & SCRIPTING
timeline.description: Auditing call logs, defining lead scoring criteria & crafting the AI persona.

timeline.title: INTEGRATION
timeline.description: Connecting Voice AI with CRM and Calendar scheduling logic.

timeline.title: GO LIVE
timeline.description: Soft launch on inbound marketing channels & performance tuning.

pipeline.title: Ingest
pipeline.description: Lead calls or submits form. AI instantly engages via Voice or SMS.

pipeline.title: Qualify
pipeline.description: AI asks 5 critical vetting questions (Budget, Location, Timeline, Credit).

pipeline.title: Nurture/Schedule
pipeline.description: Qualified? AI books viewing directly into agent calendar. Unqualified? AI adds to long-term nurture drip.

pipeline.title: Handoff
pipeline.description: Agent receives full transcript & lead score before the meeting starts.

outcomes.outcome: 25+ hours saved per agent per week on admin work.
